channel.title: Cloud on cdblg
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on cdblg

item.title: The Best Ways to Run OpenClaw in the Cloud (2026 Edition)
item.description:
If you’ve been following the AI agent space lately, you know that OpenClaw (the project formerly known as Clawdbot and briefly Moltbot) has become the gold standard for self-hosted autonomous assistants.

While running it on your local machine is great for testing, the real power of OpenClaw comes when it’s running 24/7 in the cloud. Whether it’s managing your WhatsApp messages while you sleep or executing long-running web automations, a cloud VPS is the way to go.
